title: History.Channel.Dinosaur.Secrets.Revealed.Xvid.AC3
description:
Dinosaur Secrets Revealed

History, Science Documentary hosted by Edward Herrmann and published by History Channel in 2002 - English narration


Information
------------------------------

Every time a team of paleontologists heads out on an expedition, there is a chance that they will find something that galvanizes their discipline, whether it is a new species or evidence that overturns established doctrine. From the unearthing of Tyrannosaurus Rex to the debate over whether the ancient animals were warm or cold-blooded, our knowledge of dinosaur secrets has progressed by leaps and bounds, driven by the revelations that emerge from the fossil strata.

DINOSAUR SECRETS REVEALED is a comprehensive, feature-length journey through the fascinating world of these extinct giants. Visits to sites where new discoveries are being made show how scientists use fossils to reveal not only what dinosaurs looked like, but how they behaved. And experts trace the turbulent history of paleontology, where new evidence constantly exposes the mistakes of the past and bold theories challenge long-held assumptions.
